text: usane aakaashon aur dharatee ko saty ke saath paida kiya. raat ko din par lapetata hai aur din ko raat par lapetata hai. aur usane soory aur chandrama ko vasheebhut kar rakha hai. pratyek ek niyat samay ko poora karane ke lie chal raha hai. jaan rakho, vahee prabhutvashaalee, bada kshamaasheel hai
